name: Liquid Space (itch)
description:
LIQUID SPACE

Fight through three unique levels in this space shooter inspired by on-rails classics! Includes an on-rails and free fly mode, each with mechanics including drifting, multi-lock, laser beams and more.

Known Issues and Bugs

  1. There's a rare bug where your ship will be stuck paused after a boss cutscene. Pausing and unpausing the game may fix this if you experience it.
  2. Boost and break controls are not available for mouse and keyboard users. The keys are R and F respectively.
  3. The ship will keep moving on the X-Z plane after pausing. After unpausing, the ship will be in the correct position.
  4. The Arctic Spirit pops in before the transition to field mode is complete.
